page.title: 07A Visit to Llwynhelyg Farm
page.content: The bulls at the farm are Marchigianna bulls, Semintal bulls and Anjou bulls. The calves are sold when they are eighteen months old. They only have suckling cows on the farm, they have no milking cows. Lambs are sold at 3 or 4 months old. Llwynhelyg farm they have 2 combine harvesters, 14 tractors, some ploughs, cultivators and 14 employees. The biggest tractor is 148 hp, and the smallest is 30 hp. Two silage pens on the farm can take 200 tons of silage. A Layered hedge surrounds Llwynhelyg farm. { Jane Fryer, Kazuhiro Okano, Rebbeca {Robinson, Emma Milton, Ben Field, Paul {Roberts, Paul Collings, Sara Jones, {Catherine Barrett, Sarah Daniels, {Nicholas Carter, Dafydd Owen, Zoe {Norris, Brett Chamberlain, Philip {Payne, Clare Oakman and James Rodgers
